verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>this<s%> I <S%G1492>looked,<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> and the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> was as it were of a <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> <S%G2980>talking<s%> with me; which <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G305>Come<s%> up <S%G5602>here,<s%> and I will <S%G1166>show<s%> you things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G3326>hereafter.<s%> <S%G5023><s%>

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> I was in the <S%G4151>spirit:<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G2362>throne<s%> was <S%G2749>set<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and one <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

And he that <S%G2521>sat<s%> was to <S%G3706>look<s%> on <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2393>jasper<s%> and a <S%G4555>sardine<s%> <S%G3037>stone:<s%> and there was a <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> in <S%G3706>sight<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to an <S%G4664>emerald.<s%>

And <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> were <S%G5064>four<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G2362>seats:<s%> and on the <S%G2362>seats<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2521>sitting,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2440>raiment;<s%> and they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> their <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G4735>crowns<s%> of <S%G5552>gold.<s%>

And out of the <S%G2362>throne<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> <S%G796>lightning<s%> and <S%G1027>thunder<s%> and <S%G5456>voices:<s%> and there were <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2985>lamps<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4151>Spirits<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> there was a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G2930>crystal:<s%> and in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2943>about<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> were <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> and <S%G3693>behind.<s%>

And the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2226>beast<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3023>lion,<s%> and the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2226>beast<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G3448>calf,<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2226>beast<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4383>face<s%> as a <S%G444>man,<s%> and the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G2226>beast<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G105>eagle.<s%>

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G303>each<s%> of them <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> <S%G2943>about<s%> him; and they were <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G2081>within:<s%> and they <S%G2192>rest<s%> <S%G372><s%> not <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G40>Holy,<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was, and is, and is to <S%G2064>come.<s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G2169>thanks<s%> to him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%>

The <S%G5064>four<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> down <S%G1799>before<s%> him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> him that <S%G2198>lives<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> their <S%G4735>crowns<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1411>power:<s%> for you have <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and for your <S%G2307>pleasure<s%> they are and were <S%G2936>created.<s%>
